abstract.p: Michael Schumacher wins Italian Grand Prix auto race (S)

block.p: Nothing in the Italian Grand Prix today, not even the elimination of a third of the cars in accidents before the end of the first lap, could stop Michael Schumacher from registering his 41st triumph and joining Ayrton Senna in second place on the career victory list. Only Alain Prost has more, 51.
Schumacher, who drives a Ferrari, is now 2 points behind Mika Hakkinen of Finland, who finished second here, in the championship point race, trailing by 80-78.
